00024 #ifndef _CVPARAM_HPP_
00025 #define _CVPARAM_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "cv.hpp"
00029 #include "boost/lexical_cast.hpp"
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <iosfwd>
00032 #include <vector>
00033 
00034 
00035 namespace pwiz {
00036 namespace msdata {
00037 
00038 
00039 /// represents a tag-value pair, where the tag comes from the controlled vocabulary
00040 struct CVParam
00041 {
00042     CVID cvid;
00043     std::string value;
00044     CVID units;
00045 
00046     /// template constructor performs automatic conversion from value types
00047     /// that can be lexical_casted to a string
00048     template <typename value_type>
00049     CVParam(CVID _cvid, const value_type& _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00050     :   cvid(_cvid), 
00051         value(boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(_value)),
00052         units(_units)
00053     {}
00054 
00055     /// special case for bool (no lexical_cast)
00056     CVParam(CVID _cvid, bool _value, CVID _units = CVID_Unknown)
00057     :   cvid(_cvid), value(_value ? "true" : "false"), units(_units)
00058     {}
00059 
00060     /// constructor for non-valued CVParams
00061     CVParam(CVID _cvid = CVID_Unknown)
00062     :   cvid(_cvid), units(CVID_Unknown)
00063     {}
00064 
00065     /// templated value access with type conversion
00066     template<typename value_type>
00067     value_type valueAs() const
00068     {
00069         return !value.empty() ? boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(value) 
00070                               : boost::lexical_cast<value_type>(0);
00071     } 
00072 
00073     /// convenience function to return string for the cvid 
00074     std::string name() const;
00075 
00076     /// convenience function to return string for the units 
00077     std::string unitsName() const;
00078 
00079     /// convenience function to return time in seconds (throws if units not a time unit)
00080     double timeInSeconds() const;
00081 
00082     /// functor for finding CVParam with specified exact CVID in a collection of CVParams:
00083     ///
00084     /// vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it =
00085     ///     find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParam::Is(MS_software));
00086     ///
00087     struct Is 
00088     {
00089         Is(CVID cvid) : cvid_(cvid) {}
00090         bool operator()(const CVParam& param) const {return param.cvid == cvid_;}
00091         CVID cvid_;
00092     };
00093 
00094     /// functor for finding children of a specified CVID in a collection of CVParams:
00095     ///
00096     /// vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it =
00097     ///     find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParam::IsChildOf(MS_software));
00098     ///
00099     struct IsChildOf
00100     {
00101         IsChildOf(CVID cvid) : cvid_(cvid) {}
00102         bool operator()(const CVParam& param) const {return cvIsA(param.cvid, cvid_);}
00103         CVID cvid_;
00104     };
00105 
00106     /// equality operator
00107     bool operator==(const CVParam& that) const
00108     {
00109         return that.cvid==cvid && that.value==value && that.units==units;
00110     }
00111 
00112     /// inequality operator
00113     bool operator!=(const CVParam& that) const
00114     {
00115         return !operator==(that);
00116     }
00117 
00118     bool empty() const {return cvid==CVID_Unknown && value.empty() && units==CVID_Unknown;}
00119 };
00120 
00121 
00122 /// special case for bool (no lexical_cast)
00123 /// (this has to be outside the class for gcc 3.4, inline for msvc)
00124 template<>
00125 inline bool CVParam::valueAs<bool>() const
00126 {
00127     return value == "true";
00128 }
00129 
00130 
00131 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const CVParam& param);
00132 
00133 
00134 } // namespace msdata
00135 } // namespace pwiz
00136 
00137 
00138 #endif // _CVPARAM_HPP_
